column4: Audacity periodically gives the error that it can't access the sound device. My wife, who is very much an average user, is trying to edit  the intro out of some MP3 and Ogg files, can someone suggest a GTK/GTK2 application that will let her do that AND pipe to ESD?
I'll be the sound device is /dev/dsp
I'm pretty sure it is also /dev/dsp... Is ESD an option or must I use something else?
I've no idea. I just know that /dev/dsp is a curse sometimes.
